title: qqwx
author: qqwx
created_time: October 19, 2023, 08:02:16 AMLast edit: November 27, 2023, 03:22:31 AM by qqwx
content: Tazz coin - Revolutionizing Meme Currency.Tazz Coin is born out of the idea that memes have the power to transcend boundaries and bring people together. As the world increasingly embraces digital currencies, we believe it's time to infuse the crypto space with the infectious joy and humor found in meme culture. Tazz Coin is not just a cryptocurrency; it's a movement that celebrates laughter, creativity, and community.Bounty Related All questions: Group Here Channel HerePlease Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Tuesday/Wednesday Forum time); Otherwise, you will get no stakes. Create a new post to submit your Report.Bounty detailsDear Bounty Hunters, We delightfully announcing the Tazz coin bounty program has been launched. The Bounty will run the following week. Work properly and submit on time. Bounty Rewards by $Tazz tokens. Week 1 (19 Oct - 25 Oct)..........ENDWeek 2 (26 Oct - ¬†01 Nov)..........ENDWeek 3 (02 Nov - 08 Nov)..........ENDWeek 4 (09 Nov - ¬†15 Nov)..........ENDWeek 5 (16 Nov - ¬†22 Nov)..........ENDBounty reward will be Divided below sections, üåç Section A: Twitter campaignüåç Section B: Youtube Campaignüåç Section C: Article Campaignüåç Section D: Telegram CampaignMandatory Rules‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group; &  Channel ;‚ñ†Must join  Bounty telegram group  &  Channel;‚ñ†Must follow us on Twitter;‚ñ†Must follow us on Instagram;‚ñ†Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;‚ñ†Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;‚ñ†Do not request to change wallet address without a hacked issue;‚ñ†We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;‚ñ†The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,‚ñ†Each Week will end Wednesday at 23:59 (Forum Time)All campaign Application Form‚ñ†Post a reply before join campaign‚ñ†Code:[b]#Proof_of_Authentication_PostForum Username: Telegram username: Which Campaign you joined: BSC/BEP20 wallet address: [/b]Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Youtube Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Article Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Telegam Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE LIMIT - Maximum 500 ParticipantsRules of Twitter Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Twitter page;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Must Retweet & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 posts every week with #Tazz #tazzcoin #tazzcoinbsc #BSC #BEP20 ;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;‚ñ†Your Twitter account must be old 1 month;#1000+ Followers: 1,000,000,000 Tazz token every week for each users;LIMIT - Maximum 200 ParticipantsRules of Youtube:‚ñ†Minimum 1000 Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†Subscriber must be public;‚ñ†Video minimum length 2 minutes;‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Your title must include the word Tazz Coin. And Use hashtag #Tazz #tazzcoin #tazzcoinbsc #BSC #BEP20 ;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;‚ñ†In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link and also Telegram link;‚ñ†Maximum 2 videos will be accepted for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username,& BSC/BEP20 address in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards#Good Quality: 3,000,000,000 Tazz token;#Better Quality: 5,000,000,000 Tazz token;#Best Quality: 10,000,000,000 Tazz token;Subscriber- 5001-10000 (Extra 2,000,000,000 Tazz token)10000+ (Extra 5,000,000,000 Tazz token)LIMIT - Maximum 200 ParticipantsRules of Article:‚ñ†Content Must be original;‚ñ†Your blog will be Crypto related. Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress (free blog) will not accept;‚ñ†The article must be up to 500 words;‚ñ†We don‚Äôt allow websites with no audience or new websites; the website you choose to publish your text on must be at least 2 months old and must have user activity. ‚ñ†Content must be in English‚ñ†Maximum 2 content will be accepted for one person;‚ñ†Must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Facebook Link, also Telegram link;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username, BSC/BEP20 address in Video DescriptionContent Rewards#Good Quality: 2,000,000,000 Tazz token;#Better Quality: 3,000,000,000 Tazz token;#Best Quality: 5,000,000,000 Tazz token;LIMIT - Maximum 500 ParticipantsRules of Telegram Campaign:‚ñ†Must join our Telegram group  & Telegram Channel If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;‚ñ†Add our AVATAR and name ( "Your name ¬†| Tazz Coin Supporter" ) - Mandatory;‚ñ†Positive message in Tazz Coin Group 5 times every week;‚ñ†Post a minimum of 5 messages on other Crypto Exchange groups. Like as Mexc, Bitmart, Lbank, Latoken, Hitbtc, Kucoin, and Bitget,\ (Normal message, not robotic or no hashtag);‚ñ†Do not spam into the telegram group;‚ñ†Do not use slag language in the telegram group;‚ñ†Submit your message link End of the week (Tuesday/Wednesday Forum time)Telegram Rewards#1,000,000,000 Tazz Token every week  SPREADSHEET / Participants List[N.B- Token distribution will be done by the team. I am the only bounty manager of this project. I am not responsible for the bad things about this project. I have the right to change any rules of this bounty project.]
